mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and ensure that the layout adapts more effectively on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the size of images and implement lazy loading for faster page loads.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve meta descriptions and title tags for better search engine indexing.
userExperienceTip: Make the navigation menu more visible and accessible, especially on mobile.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps required to complete the reservation.
tips: Improve mobile responsiveness by testing across various devices.
